Defendant associated with a white Malibu sedan and charged with transporting undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: White Malibu sedan associated with RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR., rented from Hertz Rental Car Company at the Laredo International Airport, and registered to a location other than where it was rented, used by smugglers
Defendant whose arrest was determined to be warranted by probable cause
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: Black Dodge pickup truck involved in a traffic stop and searched after IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. gave consent, with IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. exhibiting extreme nervousness during the stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals being transported in vehicles stopped by United States Border Patrol agents, including five passengers found in RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s white Malibu sedan
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and IGN: Vehicles involved in the incident, including a white Malibu sedan and a black Dodge pickup truck, stopped near the Border Patrol Station Parking Lot, attempting to avoid the Hebbronville Checkpoint, within fifty miles of the Mexico border, with out-of-town registrations, traveling in tandem on Farm-to-Market Road 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: Law enforcement agency involved in the incident
